doc.previous: The Corruptions Perception Index has indicated Sudan as one of the most corrupt nations in the world.[114] According to the Global Hunger Index of 2013, Sudan has an GHI indicator value of 27.0 indicating that the nation has an 'Alarming Hunger Situation' and earning the nation the distinction of being the 5th hungriest nation in the world.[115] According to the 2013 Human Development Index (HDI) Sudan ranked the 171st place in Human Development, indicating Sudan still has one of the lowest human development in the world.[116] Almost one-fifth of Sudan's population lives below the international poverty line which means living on less than US$1.25 per day.[117]
